> <OLD>
>
> Elita started to sob and she opened a com link and said to her dad "Dad wake
> up... Daddy wake up!!!"and softly cotinued sobbing

<NEW>

Silverbolt bends down so that he is at the same level as the young
Maximal, "Elita. Your father is under the care of the best doctors we
have, and we have Tuscon sharing his power with him to give him the
strength to hold on."

Silverbolt glances over at Tuscon and Rodimus, "See look." he pointed
at Tuscon's glowing chest and the energy that seemed to be radiating
from it.

><OLD>
>
> > Before anyone could think, in his state of unconsciousness, Tucson extends
> > his hand out as far as he can, hoping that it will touch upon Rodimus's
> > hand, even if it were only his fingers. He begins to talk in his sleep.

<NEW>

The distance that seperates Tuscon from Rodimus is fairly short, only
a few feet. He is just outside of arm's reach. Legacy glanced over at
Tuscon as his brain wave patturn indicated that he was rising up into
a more wakeful state of sleep for some reason. He moved quickly as he
saw Tuscon's hand reaching for Rodimus snf stepped around the beds . .
.

> <OLD>
>
> "Just - a hand - a - way. Just - a hand a way."
>
> He fights hard to extend his arm far enough to attempt to feel Rodimus's
> hand.

Legacy was about to touch Tuscon's hand, pehpas help him make the
contact when several of the tendrils that lay on Rodimus, some of the
last few reached out and grabbed hold of Tuscon's arm! A shock of
energy went through it as it glowed blue for a moment, then red and
then began to settle down into a color that was unsettling close to
Tuscon's color.

"Quickly!" Legacy said to bump and Santon, his voice louder than
normal, "This tendril must be severed from Tuscon's arm."

With a nod from Santon, Bump came over with a laser cutter and began
working on it as Santon continued to work on Rodimus. This proceedure
was proving to be far more difficult then he had at first anticipated.
Meanwhile Tuscon's form goes limp as he fell back into the deep states
of sleep.

(TAG)

Preston
